TeamPage.title: Our Team
TeamPage.description: A team of experts dedicated to your transformation

video.title: Behind Reset Club
video.subtitle: a team trained in our internal academy – the first in Morocco dedicated to therapeutic excellence and transformational coaching.

nahed.name: Nahed Rachad
nahed.title: Compassionate Guide to
nahed.subtitle: Holistic Wellness
nahed.bio1: Nahed Rachad, founder of RESET CLUB with over 15 years of expertise, has dedicated himself to specializing in personal transformation and health optimization. He has developed a practice rooted in holistic wellness, emphasizing holistic approaches to nutrition and intentional movement.
nahed.bio2: As a certified instructor with over 5000 successful transformations, Nahed integrates his wellness principles into his daily life, demonstrating his commitment to health and well-being. He believes in setting realistic goals with his clients, guiding them towards sustainable long-term behavioral changes.
nahed.bio3: Beyond his professional life, Nahed embraces every moment of his fulfillment. Whether it's traveling, exploring new experiences, or simply savoring simple pleasures, he finds pure joy and happiness.

director.name: Sarah Martinez
director.title: General Director
director.subtitle: Reset Club™
director.bio1: Sarah Martinez brings over 15 years of experience in managing premium wellness centers across Europe and the Middle East.
director.bio2: A graduate in hospitality management from École Hôtelière de Lausanne and certified in wellness management, she has led several luxury establishments before joining Reset Club™. Her strategic vision and customer excellence-focused approach have enabled the creation of a unique holistic transformation experience.
director.bio3: Passionate about innovation in the wellness sector, Sarah firmly believes that sustainable transformation requires a global approach combining cutting-edge technology, human expertise, and personalized support.

team.title: Our Expert Team
team.subtitle: A multidisciplinary team of specialists dedicated to your transformation

sarah.name: Dr. Sarah Martinez
sarah.description: Specialist in metabolic optimization and personalized nutrition for lasting results. After completing her masters in nutritional medicine, Dr. Sarah has practiced for over 12 years in renowned hospitals and wellness retreats.

marc.name: Marc Dubois
marc.description: Marc is a dynamic professional with over 10 years of rich multicultural experience encompassing resorts and wellness retreats. He specializes in personalized training programs.

amina.name: Dr. Amina Hassan
amina.description: Dr. Amina has over 8 years of diverse experience in psychological support for life transformations. She specializes in the art of guiding sustainable behavioral changes.

thomas.name: Thomas Laurent
thomas.description: Chef Thomas has over 15 years of experience in wellness culinary arts. He is well-versed in modern European cuisines, with a strong focus on health and prepares simple yet sophisticated dishes.

fatima.name: Dr. Fatima Al-Zahra
fatima.description: Expert in hormonal optimization and anti-aging medicine for longevity. Dr. Fatima specializes in guiding clients towards optimal health through hormonal balance.

alexandre.name: Alexandre Moreau
alexandre.description: Practitioner in alternative therapies and holistic wellness support. Alexandre combines different therapeutic approaches to create personalized healing programs.

PressBanner.title: They talk about innovation, we talk about revolution.
PressBanner.description: Reset Club™ doesn't just appear in the media: it redefines how we experience health, body shape, and emotional balance

IntroSection.hook: What if your body, mind, and emotions could be reset in one place?
IntroSection.title: Reset Club™ – Morocco's first premium holistic transformation center.
IntroSection.description: You've tried everything: diets, exercise, treatments... Nothing has ever lasted. Here, you will discover an exclusive method – In • Out • Reset™ – that combines neuroscience, biohacking, and transformational coaching to unlock your blockages, reboot your energy, and reveal your potential.

hero.title: OUR STORY
hero.subtitle: The quest that gave birth to a movement

nahed.name: Nahed Rachad
nahed.title: Founder & Visionary
nahed.subtitle: Reset Club
nahed.bio1: It all started with a personal quest.
nahed.bio2: Nahed Rachad, founder of RESET CLUB with over 15 years of expertise, has dedicated himself to specializing in personal transformation and health optimization. He has developed a practice rooted in holistic wellness, emphasizing holistic approaches to nutrition and intentional movement
nahed.bio3: From this quest was born a method, and today, a movement: Reset Club.
nahed.seeMore: I am discovering the RESET experience

WhyResetClub.title: WHY IS RESET CLUB UNIQUE?
WhyResetClub.subtitle: You've tried everything... Here, you discover your true limits & solutions with the signature In—Out—Reset method

values.title: Measurable Transformation
values.description: Visible, concrete and measurable results. Thanks to our technologies (InBody, OligoCheck™), every evolution is scientifically tracked — for a lasting and quantifiable transformation.

innovation.title: Innovation & Science
innovation.description: Science & Biohacking — Cutting-edge protocols from neuroscience and longevity research. Advanced technologies serving measurable well-being and cellular performance.

transformation.title: Women's Empowerment
transformation.description: Female Leadership — Reveal your personal power: Reset Club™ guides you towards your full potential. An inner transformation approach to reclaim leadership over your life.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: Premium standards, rigorous protocols and a team trained & certified according to the best international benchmarks. Every detail embodies the precision, reliability and caring luxury of Reset Club™.

holistic.title: Care & Safety
holistic.description: A protective, professional and human environment. Our certified practitioners guarantee holistic and reassuring support in a highly ethical environment.

method.title: Integral Beauty
method.description: Reveal the balance between your inner beauty and your natural radiance — authentic, lasting and unfiltered beauty. Beauty becomes an alignment between body, mind and emotions.
